content.rendered:
Coronavirus (COVID-19) resources for you and your loved ones.

Worried about coronavirus? We’ve put together a list of important resources for Canadians to access during the COVID-19 pandemic. Find out how the virus is progressing and how you can protect yourself and loved ones.

Government of Canada website

Latest updates, travel advisories, financial support and other resources from the government of Canada, all in one place.

World Health Organization website

The most up to date world news, developments and best practices directly from the World Health Organization.

The ultimate COVID-19 resource guide

We’ve put together all the information you need about COVID-19: guidelines, frequently asked questions, mental health advice, and tips on adapting to your new normal.

Quick Advice

Vaccine Information

Parenting during quarantine

Grocery shopping safely

Staying fit while at home

Useful Resources

Useful Resources

See a doctor from home.

Our network of Canadian doctors is available 24/7. Get the help you need safely, when you need it.

Register
